languages.text: {n}{petname} издает пронзительный крик и расправляет крылья. Кажется, что орел прекрасно понял значение священного жеста и решил благословить вас в ответ.{/n}
{n}{petname} lets out a piercing cry, wings outstretched. It seems the eagle understands the meaning of the sacred gesture perfectly and has decided to bless you in return.{/n}

languages.text: {n}{petname}は鋭い叫び声を上げ、翼を広げた。イーグルは聖なるジェスチャーを正しく理解し、あなたに祝福を返そうとしているらしい。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}{petname} lets out a piercing cry, wings outstretched. It seems the eagle understands the meaning of the sacred gesture perfectly and has decided to bless you in return.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}{petname}は鋭い叫び声を上げ、翼を広げた。イーグルは聖なるジェスチャーを正しく理解し、あなたに祝福を返そうとしているらしい。{/n}

languages.text: {n}{petname} schreit durchdringend, die Flügel ausgebreitet. Anscheinend versteht der Adler die Bedeutung der heiligen Geste und hat beschlossen, dich ebenfalls zu segnen.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}{petname} lets out a piercing cry, wings outstretched. It seems the eagle understands the meaning of the sacred gesture perfectly and has decided to bless you in return.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}{petname} schreit durchdringend, die Flügel ausgebreitet. Anscheinend versteht der Adler die Bedeutung der heiligen Geste und hat beschlossen, dich ebenfalls zu segnen.{/n}

languages.text: {n}{petname} pousse un cri perçant en étendant ses ailes. Il semblerait que l'aigle saisisse parfaitement le sens de ce geste sacré et ait décidé de vous bénir à son tour.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}{petname} lets out a piercing cry, wings outstretched. It seems the eagle understands the meaning of the sacred gesture perfectly and has decided to bless you in return.{/n}

languages.text: {n}{petname} da un grito estridente con las alas extendidas. Al parecer el águila entiende perfectamente el significado del santiguamiento y ha decidido otorgarte su propia bendición.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}{petname} lets out a piercing cry, wings outstretched. It seems the eagle understands the meaning of the sacred gesture perfectly and has decided to bless you in return.{/n}

languages.text: {n}{petname}展开双翼，发出了刺耳的叫声。看起来，这只猎鹰完全理解这个神圣手势的含义，决定回应你的祝福。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}{petname} lets out a piercing cry, wings outstretched. It seems the eagle understands the meaning of the sacred gesture perfectly and has decided to bless you in return.{/n}

languages.text: {n}{petname} kanatlarını gererek tiz bir ses çıkarıyor. Görünen o ki kartal bu kutsal işaretin manasını biliyor ve karşılığında o da seni kutsuyor.{/n}
